Inferno Ports

Introduction

This page contains pre-built kernel files, or system images, for ports of the Inferno operating system to various devices.

Each of the following sections contains information about a port of Inferno and a kernel to download for testing. Once you have verified that a kernel basically works, you should clone the repository for that platform and customize the build to suit your own requirements.

Apollo3

Download: kernel

SAMD51

Download: kernel

STM32F405

Download: kernel

Teensy 4.1 MicroMod

Download: kernel
